question: Is it true that on the day of judgement you will be next to whoever you love,for eg. If someone loves a tv star they will be next to them.could you tell me the hadith which has this
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Yes, it is true. Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ?A person will be with whom he/she loves.?

This Hadith of Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) was said in the context of a person going to Jannat. However, it could refer to people of hell as well. Therefore, tv stars are generally non-Muslims who are heading straight to hell. We should not befriend them nor love them.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
